毐字的基本解释

毐
ǎi
品行不端正的人。

毐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ǎi］
［《廣韻》於改切，上海，影。］
［《廣韻》烏開切，平咍，影。］
(1)旧指男子品行不端。
(2)指战国秦嫪毐。

毐字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毋字部】　毐； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页589第04
【廣韻】於改切【集韻】【韻會】倚亥切，?音唉。【說文】人無行也，一說嫪毐，秦人，以淫坐誅，故世罵淫曰嫪毐。【通雅】嫪毐，音勞靄。　又【廣韻】烏開切【集韻】於開切，?音哀。義同。　又【玉篇】古文娭字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ǎi］
["Guang Yun" Yu Gaiqie, Shanghai, film. ]
["Guangyun" Wukai cut, flat 咍, shadow. ]
(1) Old refers to men's misconduct.
(2) Refers to the Warring States Period Qin Lai.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Wu Zi Department] 　毐; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 589 04
[Guang Yun] Yu Gaiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Lean on Haiqie,? Sounds alas. [Speaking of texts] There is no way for people. When talking about 嫪毐, the people of Qin punish the people of adultery by sitting and punishing them. Therefore, the world scolds them as 嫪毐. [Tongya] Lai 毐, Yin Lao Ai.　[Guang Yun] Wu Kaiqi [Ji Yun] in Kaiqi,? The sound is sad. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Ancient Chinese characters.
